TextView.android:text: This service issues the environmental clearance in adherence to Municipal Solid Waste Management Ordinance and the Municipal Environmental Code, providing orientation to demonstrate commitment, mitigate environmental impact, and promote sustainable development.
2. If there is an existing environmental violation, present the official receipt.
1.2. Participate in the information and education session at the Municipal Environment and Natural Resources Office (MENRO).
1.2.1. Conduct information and education on proper solid waste management and environmental laws.
1.4. Accomplish the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS) and drop in the Feedback box.
Request the client to accomplish the Client Satisfaction Survey
